mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_TRIP_LOG ( LOG_ID, ACCO_ID, REST_ID, ATTR_ID, LOG_CONTENT, PLAN_DAY, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{logId}, #{accoId}, #{restId}, #{attrId}, #{logContent}, #{planDay}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT LOG_ID, ACCO_ID, REST_ID, ATTR_ID, LOG_CONTENT, PLAN_DAY FROM TB_TRIP_LOG WHERE LOG_ID = #{logId} ORDER BY PLAN_DAY, ACCO_ID, ATTR_ID, REST_ID
